title: Free
lyrics:
I think we spent too long
Living our lives through the eyes of another
Tell us we're not that strong
But I feel alive, knowing we got each other
I know the storm is coming

But trust me we'll outrun it

Hear my heartbeat drumming

An open road is calling

Aren't you tired of stalling

Almost feels like falling



Tonight we're gonna find the key

So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free

So try, open your eyes and see

So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free



So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free

So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free



It's gonna be alright

All of the ghosts are fading behind us

And don't you dare apologize

We got the scars on our hearts to remind us



I know the storm is coming

But trust me we'll outrun it

Hear my heartbeat drumming

An open road is calling

Aren't you tired of stalling

Almost feels like falling



Tonight we're gonna find the key

So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free

So try, open your eyes and see

So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free



So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free

So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free



Don't hide your feelings, now's not the time

The rhythm you're hearing is your lifeline

Just give me a reason, show me a sign

We'll fight for our freedom



Tonight we're gonna find the key

So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free

So try, open your eyes and see

So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free



So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free

So baby follow me 'cause we are gonna be free
